participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and creative, with a love for music and animals. Enjoys sharing experiences and connecting with others.
participant_1.background: My parents are proud of me, even though they don't understand my job. I have blonde hair. My least favorite music is country. I love smooth jazz. I like to eat mangoes when they're ripe and sweet.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Dedicated and nurturing, with a passion for education and a love for storytelling. Enjoys creative hobbies like LARPing.
participant_2.background: I want a home with a room where I can set up my larp equipment and play without worrying about damaging the floors or walls. I am a passionate educator who enjoys bringing the joy of learning to life in my students. I love to read romance novels. I wake up at 5:30 am and practice my music for an hour before my family wakes up. I eat too much fast food.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
Good! I am an educator who enjoys bringing the joy of learning to life in my students.
Awesome! What is your favorite subject to teach?
I love to teach English but I also enjoy teaching Math.
What do you like about teaching English?
I love seeing the moment when a student finally understands a concept they have been struggling with.
I bet that is a great feeling! What type of music do you like to listen to?
I enjoy listening to smooth jazz and romantic music.
Those are both great genres of music! I love smooth jazz as well.
I love the saxophone and the piano in smooth jazz.
Me too! I also love the way the music makes me feel relaxed.
It is such a calming genre of music.
Do you have any pets?
I have two dogs and a cat.
Aww! I love animals! What kind of dogs do you have?
I have a golden retriever and a black lab.
Those are both great breeds! I have always wanted a golden retriever.
They are the best dogs! They are so friendly and loving.
I bet they are! I love animals so much.
Me too! They make life so much better
